title: AD Itemization is garbage though
body:
Its pretty stupid how much better AP itemization is in every way.

Here's a few examples.

{{item:3156}}  Maw of Malmortius: The only offensive/defensive item for AD casters
60 Attack Damage
40 Magic Resist
400HP magic damage shield @ 30% HP (90 Second CD) Passive
Cost: 3200g (92.5% Gold efficient without passive)

{{item:3001}} Abyssal Sceptre: AP/MR itemization for mages
70 Ability Power
50 Magic Resist
700 range 20 magic resist reduction
Cost: 2440g (103.4% Gold efficient without aura) 

Mages are also allowed to rush Abyssal Sceptre because its build path is efficient as well.

Oh and let's not forget about this item:

{{item:3027}} Rod of Ages
On top of having nothing comparable for AD it is one one of the most gold efficient items in the game. 

AD Itemization is utter garbage, along with MR Itemization.
